data.description:
**Embark on an exhilarating journey where you can run, walk, or even ski through virtual landscapes. Choose from a variety of immersive worlds, each offering unique challenges and scenery.**

- **Forest Trails:** Run or walk through lush, green forests.
- **Quests:** Complete exciting quests on remote islands.
- **Snowy Days:** Glide across snowy terrains on skis.
- **Sky Paths:** Collect coins on wooden paths high up in the sky.
- **Desert Island:** Explore the vast, sandy deserts.
- **Mazes:** Find the fastest way, or not.
- **Elliptical Machine:** Try the experimental level.

Unlock achievements by collecting coins and hidden diamonds as you explore. With a mix of free and paid levels, there‚Äôs always something new to discover.

Our app is designed to make your workouts fun and engaging. Get moving and enjoy the adventure!

**Download now and start your journey for free!**

changelog.change_log: Just some minor bug squashing for the new and improved levels.

We‚Äôre thrilled to announce some fantastic additions to our virtual reality game:

New Quests: Embark on thrilling adventures with fresh quests that will challenge your skills and immerse you in captivating narratives.

Free Level: Explore a brand-new level without any cost! Uncover hidden secrets, solve puzzles, and enjoy the immersive environment.

Low Poly Designs: Our game now features even more low-poly visuals, enhancing performance while maintaining a unique and stylish look.

Human Characters: Added humans to make the quests and stories more alive.

And that‚Äôs not all! We‚Äôve fine-tuned gameplay mechanics, squashed pesky bugs, and optimized performance. Dive into the updated world of our VR game today!

Embark on an epic quest in our latest update! Explore North Island as the hero, sprinting through lush landscapes, collecting coins and diamonds, and uncovering hidden secrets. And this is just the beginning‚Äîstay tuned for even more thrilling adventures!

We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that our latest update brings not only a transformed Skiing level but also smoother movement across all levels for an even more fluid VR experience. Dive into the updated tutorial to master the latest movement options, and explore every free level with ease under a single tab.

Mixed Reality Menu Area: We‚Äôve introduced an exciting mixed reality menu area that seamlessly blends the virtual and real worlds. Navigate through your options with ease!

Smoother Paths: All running paths have undergone significant improvements, resulting in a more fluid and enjoyable experience. Say goodbye to jarring transitions!

Elliptical Machine Enhancements:
* Lap Timing: The elliptical machine level now features lap timing functionality. Keep track of your performance and beat your personal best!
* Best Lap: Compete against yourself or challenge friends to achieve the ultimate lap time. Who will be the fastest?

New Levels Await:
üå≤ Forest Map: Immerse yourself in a lush, serene forest environment. Feel the crunch of leaves beneath your virtual sneakers as you explore.
üåÄ Maze Adventure: Get lost (and found!) in our intricate maze. Sharpen your reflexes and find the exit!
‚òÅÔ∏è Skyworld: Ascend to new heights in this ethereal realm. Soar through the clouds and unlock hidden secrets.

More levels are already in development, promising even more exhilarating adventures! Lace up your virtual shoes and let the journey begin. üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüå†

In this exhilarating update to our VR running game, we‚Äôve introduced an exciting new way to propel yourself forward: arm swinging! Now, as you sprint through the virtual landscapes, you can literally swing your arms to gain momentum and surge ahead. It‚Äôs an immersive experience that‚Äôll make you feel like you‚Äôre sprinting through the digital world.

But don‚Äôt take our word for it‚Äîtry it out for yourself in any of the levels! Whether you‚Äôre racing through the forest or exploring the desert, the arm-swinging mechanic adds a whole new dimension to your gameplay.

And that‚Äôs not all! We‚Äôve also addressed a common concern: offline play. With this update, you can confidently run your purchased levels even when you‚Äôre not connected to the internet. So whether you‚Äôre on a remote cabin or simply prefer to game offline, our VR running adventure has got you covered.

Get ready to break a sweat, feel the wind in your virtual hair, and conquer those levels like never before. Lace up your digital sneakers, swing those arms, and let the adrenaline flow!

Smoother Movement: Experience a significantly improved movement system that enhances your in-game agility.
Crisper Main Menu: The main menu now boasts increased resolution, providing a visually polished and inviting interface.
Sky World Level Enhancements: Dive into an even more captivating Sky World with refined details and immersive visuals.
Enhanced Button Functionality: We‚Äôve added new functionalities to the game controller buttons, making your gameplay more intuitive and exciting.
Info-Tab Updates: Don‚Äôt forget to explore the updated info-tab to discover the purpose of each button.
This update not only enhances the appearance of the grass but also significantly reduces the installation size.
We‚Äôre excited to introduce the latest update to our game, including a preview of the level Sky World! This update also includes enhanced graphics and a redesigned context menu.
Extra menu button for easy access. Improved Valentine's Day level, with more "cheesy" feedbacks and nice clouds.
New Maze level.

Valentine's Day level. 
Mini Map in the Maze. 
More audio feedback.
More coins!
Improved hand tracking
Now with support for Scoreboards! And some minor bug fixes.
Includes a preview of a 1D level for Elliptical Machines. And a tab with some statistics.
Improvements for the Holiday Special level. Northern Lights and much more to collect!
Now with a free Holiday Special level. This update also includes improved graphics in the tutorial and a path in the Snow Day level.
Now with grass and flowers on North Island and some minor bug fixes.
